verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> may <S%H1481>abide<s%> <S%H7931><s%> in Thy <S%H168>tent<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>?
He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> with <S%H8549>integrity,<s%> and <S%H6466>works<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> And <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> in his <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

He does not <S%H7270>slander<s%> with his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H5375>takes<s%> up a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> his <S%H7453>friend;<s%>

In whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> a <S%H3988>reprobate<s%> is <S%H959>despised,<s%> But who <S%H3513>honors<s%> those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> He <S%H7650>swears<s%> to his own <S%H7489>hurt,<s%> and does not <S%H4171>change;<s%>

He does not <S%H5414>put<s%> out his <S%H3701>money<s%> at <S%H5392>interest,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> does he <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H9345>innocent.<s%> He who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>
